author: mark-grimes
body:
Creates two new workflows to use HGCal v5 but using PandoraPFA in the reconstruction.  Workflows are exactly the same as the normal Extended2023HGCalMuon except that this customisation function is used:

```
RecoParticleFlow/PandoraTranslator/customizeHGCalPandora_cff.cust_2023HGCalPandoraMuon
```

Numbers are 156xx for 0 pileup; and 158xx for 140 pileup.
Also fixed some whitespace.

@boudoul, I'd be interested if you have a better way of implementing this.  I just replicated the Extended2023HGCalMuon workflows and changed the customisation function.  There is obviously a lot of duplication so perhaps you have a better solution?
Also, I wasn't sure if some of the older workflows could be replaced, so played it safe and added new ones.

@vandreev11, @pfs, @lgray, @sethzenz, @kpedro88
title: Add workflows to reconstruct HGCal using PandoraPFA
